column4: So uh. I just activated the latest nVidia driver in Additional Drivers...a.nd when I rebooted and logged in.....the toolbar thing wasn't work. I couldn't click on anything. Now I'm in the recovery concole on IRSSI, 'cause I can't do anything else.
Hmm when i activated my drivers unity and everythinf displayed on the wrong screen.now i just installed Gnome-shell and everything is working fine
